sub_title: Senior Sustainability Consultant at Nexio Projects | Guiding you through your sustainability journey
summary:
My passion in life is to make the world a better place. This is why I steered my career towards social issues, starting with completing my studies in Social Policy and Human Rights. I spent three years helping to build a progressive political movement, Volt Europa, by facilitating its European Policy Team. Dedicated to trying different ways of achieving change, I developed my ESG knowledge and followed a career in corporate social responsibility and sustainability.
As a Senior ESG Facilitator at Nexio Projects I help businesses to integrate sustainability and develop responsible practices.

﻿﻿| Sustainability Strategy | Project Management | Business Development | Sustainability Reporting | Consulting | SDGs | CSR | Human rights
